name: rewind-app
description: Rewind - Rediscover Podcasts with AI-powered recommendations

scripts.test:smoke: npm run smoke-test && npm run test-compilation
scripts.test:all: npm run test:smoke && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:infra
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:infra
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../infra && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../infra && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format:check || true

author: Rewind Team
